DescriptionData.Title: HMS Deluxe Vinyl Clown Shoes w/ Toe Socks
DescriptionData.Description: vinyl clown shoes have a 12 inch, heavy-duty ruber sole with the open, jagged toes for effect fun effect. Multicolored toe socks are included, but of course you can replace them with socks of your own choosing (sock colors may vary). One size fits average feet, up to about a mens 10.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Vinyl clown shoes with heavy duty rubber soles
Vinyl clown shoes have a 12 inch, heavy-duty rubber sole with the open, jagged toes
Toes stick out, showing your colorful socks
Multicolored toe socks are included, or you can replace them with socks of your own choosing
Economy clown shoes may have small flaws due to the manufacturing process
